segments.text: I see the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and he looks so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I’m terrified he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for her treat, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is right there, drying dishes, and she has no idea what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to slip, and it’s going to be a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and the floor is getting wetter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something to stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is while everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
